title: Solved: How to Log into My Account? - Pandora Community
text: Hi there, @vtech44444. Thanks for posting about this. Pandora accounts follow the email address, not the device or phone number. You can sign into the same Pandora account on any computer or supported device, as long as you use the same email address and Pandora password. This applies to both free and paid Pandora accounts. If you're using a computer: You can sign in using your email address and password here: https://www.pandora.com/account/sign-in From a mobile device: Simply sign into the app with your Pandora account email address and password. ++ If you need assistance with resetting your password, or you're using a different device, please let us know and we can follow up with you.
